summary: Completed testing of updated truck parts e-commerce store. All new requirements verified: company description replaces categories, search-only catalog, authentication required for cart, checkout with ФИО field, cash-only payment. Backend APIs (30/30) and frontend functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Homepage shows 'avarus-Venditore' company description instead of categories
'К покупкам' button correctly links to /catalog search page
Catalog shows search prompt by default (no products until search)
Search functionality works - products appear only after search query
Prices and stock visible to non-authenticated users
Adding to cart redirects to login (authentication required)
Checkout page requires authentication (proper redirect to login)
Checkout form includes ФИО (full_name) field with proper validation
Checkout form includes address and phone fields
Payment method shows 'cash on delivery' only
Backend order creation requires full_name, address, phone
Account page designed to show full_name and payment method in order history
All 30 backend API endpoints working correctly
Updated backend test to use new full_name requirement
